This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Property mask-size value '1px'
  assert_equals: expected "1px auto" but got "1px"
[FAIL] Property mask-size value '1px auto'
  assert_equals: expected "1px auto" but got "1px"
[FAIL] Property mask-size value 'auto, 100%' multiple values
  assert_equals: expected "auto, 100% auto" but got "auto, 100%"
[FAIL] Property mask-size value '100%' multiple values
  assert_equals: expected "100% auto, 100% auto" but got "100%, 100%"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
